idea:
NATUCARE HERBESSENCE PRIVATE LIMITED is a leading manufacturer and supplier of 100+ quality phytochemicals, botanical extracts for herbal formulations, food/beverage, cosmetics, personal care products, etc. We deal with research related to herbal products that include herbal drug extraction, isolation of phytochemicals, preparation of various extracts, analysis, analytical method development, estimation of bioactive constituent in plants, standardization of raw materials and formulation, etc. Natucare India, is a research-based company having a diverse combination of skills and expertise of about 9 years in herbal or natural products and dietary food supplements. We can help you develop new, innovative and functional products for todays’ competitive market.

Natucare India have a highly influential and experienced team. Our Analytical Chemists utilize equipment such as HPLC, HPTLC, GC/MS, LC/MS-MS, TLC to properly validate botanical quality, integrity, and purity. Our experienced staff and modern laboratories are a tremendous resource when looking for solutions to your botanical applications. We provide guidance to academia as well as industry in designing research strategies to study the quality, safety, and efficacy of product. We have earned a reputation for helping our customers increase the value of their research, gain competitive advantage, and develop trusted brands. .Natucare India provides you the opportunity to enter Indian market with correct direction by providing market research data, marketing strategy, etc.
name: NATUCARE HERBESSENCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: In India, there is a significant gap between the availability of skilled mental health specialists and individuals desiring urgent access to such services. According to the WHO, India's mental health workforce is inadequate, and there is a significant deficit of psychologists in the country when compared to the number of persons suffering from mental illnesses. According to the WHO, there are 0.07 psychologists and social workers per 100,000 people in India (0.07). WHO also forecasts that about 7.5 percent of Indians have a mental ailment and that by the end of this year, roughly 20% of the population will have a mental illness. According to statistics, 56 million Indians suffer from depression, with another 38 million suffering from anxiety disorders. India is in desperate need of 38,000 clinical psychologists and many more mental health professionals. And thus, Psyche Care First aims to generate more skilled mental health workers to serve the normal population on the edge of developing any kind of mental illness. Psyche Care First aims to create more mental health workers to serve the normal population on the edge of developing any kind of mental illness by providing comprehensive training and on-field internship to students and individuals belonging to the field of psychology to further sharpen their skills in order to be able to provide mental health first add and psycho-educate to those who need it thereby bettering their lives. We are providing a three-step solution starting with consultation, guidance, and training depending on the needs of the client. The company would charge a small amount in exchange for services offered to the clients.
name: PSYCHE CARE FIRST LLP

idea:
ABOUT US


Gorewo is a one-stop global platform that offers diverse remote job opportunities with companies that go beyond geographic boundaries. We also provide a platform to conduct instant remote hiring process through artificial intelligence to shortlist the candidates via interview rounds and get refined talent for the organizations that partner with us. Alongside we also conduct the background verification process of the selected candidates and take up the payroll management for the organisations. With institute affiliation, we strive to bring out fresh and relevant set of talent from the respective institutes. Rest assured, we provide a seamless experience for both the candidates and the companies. Times are changing, let's change the way of work too.


VISION


Curating ways to provide equal opportunities for all the skilful minds in order to bridge gaps between companies and talent heads on a global level.
name: Gorewo

idea: SOLASTAA HAIR & SKIN PRIVATE LIMITED  has transformed into a beauty destination with a leading beauty image; large format with a separate section allocated for beauty services, and a robust beauty ecommerce presence with a wide range of makeup, skin, hair, personal care, fragrance and men’s grooming brands.. we also run the Academy where beauty therapists and stylists are trained to hone their skills and polish their talent. We also offer courses in hair, skin, makeup, nails and salon management. We’ve become so used to seeing the highlights of everyone’s lives and comparing their ‘Best-Hits’ with our everyday jingles, their best moments with our routine ones that it’s begun to take a toll on our confidence. And it makes us wonder .Through our excellent grooming services, we provide the care and love you need for a sense of overall well-being and happiness.
name: SOLASTAA HAIR & SKIN PRIVATE LIMITED
